Explanation: This is the unique identifier for each row in the dataset. It helps track and reference each observation separately
This represents the latitude of the location, showing its north-south position on the Earth’s surface
This represents the longitude of the location, showing its east-west position on the Earth’s surface
This is the start date of the 14-day period for which all the measurements and forecasts are valid
Start date of the 14-day period for which all measurements and forecasts apply
